channel.title: Israel National Radio - Temple Talk
channel.description: Temple Talk with Rabbi Chaim Richman and Yitzchak Reuven covers everything you need to know about the Temple Mount in Jerusalem, and the building of the Third Temple (Beit HaMikdash). Discussions include the Temple's history and significance today for both Jews and non-Jews. Also discussed are the weekly Torah portion, Bnei Noach issues and new projects of the Temple Institute. The Temple Talk podcast airs Tuesdays from 8:00 p.m. to 9:00 p.m. Israel time / 1-2 p.m. U.S. EST on Israel National Radio. For show archives and more visit http://www.TempleInstitute.org

image.title: Israel National Radio - Temple Talk
image.description: A neo-Zionist perspective on Israel and the Jewish World.
